name: Cine Tracer 2
description:
Cine Tracer 2 is a virtual filmmaking sandbox that allows filmmakers to visualize short films, commercials, and feature films. The game has a strong first person framework built from scratch in Unreal Engine 5 that takes advantage of new lighting technology like Lumen Global Illumination and Reflections. The system has also been designed to work well with both gamepad/controller and mouse and keyboard.

Included is a single camera dolly system, a small lighting library, and two locations. The first location is a Gas Station that uses the new Sun, Sky, and Clouds system. The second location is a Warehouse Stage with a pre built 3 wall White Cyc and pre designed lighting grid.

The virtual actors are made with MetaHumans 2.0 and offer a wide range of hair options. There is small selection of clothing and and actors poses.
